Grid class constructer

Parameters:
x - the x position coordinate
y - the y position coordinate
sizeWidth - the width size coordinate
difficulty - the game difficulty
screenWidth - the screen width
screenHeight - the screen height
mineDensity - the games mine density

This method initialises the grid and constructs each tile object in the array

inputParser

public void inputParser(MotionEvent event,
                        boolean pan,
                        boolean press,
                        boolean flag)
This method handles the input

Parameters:
event - The MotionEvent object containing the input details
pan - Boolean indicating that the grid is responding to panning
press - Boolean indicating that the grid is responding to pressing
flag - Boolean indicating that the grid is responding to flagging

Method for setting pan on all the tiles

Parameters:

                     int ySize,
                     int xSel,
                     int ySel)
This method generates the game

Parameters:
xSize - the width of the grid
ySize - the height of the grid
xSel - the x value of the tile being first selected
ySel - the y value of the tile being first selected

checkSurround

public void checkSurround(int x,
                          int y)
This method recursively checks the surrounding mines and exposes them if they are blank.

Parameters:
x - the x value of count starting point
y - the y value of count starting point

countMine

public int countMine(int x,
                     int y)
This method counts the number of mines surrounding a tile

Parameters:
x - the x increment in the tile array to be counted
y - the y increment in the tile array to be counted
Returns:
returns the number of mines surrounding the tile

select

public int[] select(int x,
                    int y,
                    boolean flag)
This method returns the tile position of the tile that has been selected

Parameters:
x - the screen x coordinate to be checked
y - the screen y coordinate to be checked
flag - whether the selection is flagging or not
Returns:
returns an array of coordinates [0] = x [1] = y

gameLost

public void gameLost()
This method reveals all the tiles

checkWin

public boolean checkWin()
This method checks if the game has been won by checking all mines for flags

Returns:
returns true is won, false is not
